title.rendered: THIS Feeling is Guaranteed to Improve Any Golf Swing

content.rendered:
​How to Hit The Ball Then the Ground | This Just Works!

If you want to add 20 yards while hitting it straighter and more consistently… 

This Is Your Exclusive Invitation to Access the Top Speed Golf System for the Rest of the Year, for FREE

Hey there, it’s Clay 🙂 

I’ve been sitting on an offer that might be the biggest no-brainer you’ve ever seen, and I’m dying to tell you about it. 

Starting January 1, I’m making it easier than ever – not to mention super affordable – to join All Access Membership…

… and unlock the game-changing library of instruction that has helped tens of thousands of golfers go from the first tee jitters of “Who knows where this is going!?” to shooting personal best scores that have them taking all the cash. 

Golfers like Shawn Fitchet from North Carolina, who dropped his handicap by FIVE shots in three weeks!

And Michael Thiel from Phoenix, AZ who said, ““My handicap before joining Top Speed Golf was 12 to 13, and now it’s at least an 8… I’m a solid 2 clubs longer now. It’s not because I’m any stronger; it’s just better technique.”

Just like those players (and too many more to list here), when you tap into the almost magical powers of All Access Membership, you will… 

… bomb it past your buddies. 

… split fairway after fairway.

… send your handicap plummeting. 

… and become the guy everyone is asking, “What’s your secret!?” because you’re hitting it so well. 

The best part is it’s super easy to get started. 

PLUS, I’m going to throw in a huge freebie for everyone who’s reading this page right now (that’s you 😉).

Here’s the Deal…

Getting your hands on All Access Membership – the one responsible for thousands of stroke-saving transformations, ones like those I mentioned above – used to require joining for a full year AND paying the full year in advance. 

While annual members tell me it is the single best golf instruction investment they’ve ever made, I realize not everyone wants to sign up for a whole year at once.

I get it. 

That’s why in 2024 I’m rolling out a new way to join All Access. It’s an easy, low-price, low-commitment, 3-month quarterly membership.

Here’s where this gets exciting for you, right now. 

When you pre-enroll for Q1 2024 today, I’ll give you the rest of 2023 FOR FREE.

Yep, sign up for Q1 2024 today and you’ll get immediate access to everything inside All Access Membership… like minutes from now… no waiting until January, and your membership will not renew / you won’t be billed again until April 1st. (Cancel easily any time.)

Speaking of billing, you’re probably wondering how much a quarterly All Access Membership costs?

I’ll tell you… it’s a steal.

If you paid for three months of lessons with a local pro, you’d easily spend $3,000 or more.

I don’t do 1-on-1 lessons anymore, but on those rare occasions I charge upwards of $1,500 per hour.

Even a single lesson with a pro in your area would run you at least $100 (usually more). 

The good news is, I’m not going to charge you anywhere near that. 

You can become a full-fledged member with unlimited access to my distance-boosting, score-slashing instruction for just $49/quarter.

$49 a quarter! That’s just $16.33 a month. Or about $0.54 a day.

Cancel anytime.

49 bucks less than some guys spend on lunch at the turn and drinks on the 19th hole.

When you factor in the free month I’m giving you right now, you’re only paying 40 cents per day for your first four months. 

I told you I was making it a drop dead no-brainer, didn’t I? 

So, when you pre-enroll in 2024 quarterly All Access quarterly membership right now, you’ll get immediate access – like minutes from now – and you won’t be billed again until April 1, 2024.

if you’d like to learn more, take a few minutes right now to read the entire message below, and let me introduce you to what many Top Speed golfers believe is…

The Fastest Way To Improve Every Part Of Your Game…

The Top Speed Community is built in pursuit of my bigger mission… 

And that mission is: 

To turn your golf dreams into a reality through focused effort and simple instruction in plain English – not complicated technical jargon. 

This mission is so important that I’m going to give you access for the rest of 2023 for FREE today. 

This offer is much more than a money-saver (although it’s certainly that).

It’s for the golfer who truly wants to improve in every part of the game.

From blasting longer drives to confidently hitting more greens in regulations with deadly accurate iron shots.

Spinning your wedges with pinpoint control, leading to more birdie putts and tap-in pars…

Easily escaping bunkers, getting up-and-down more often from improved chipping…

… banishing three-putts…

Even honing the mental game so you can shave strokes from better decision making.

No matter what, I’ve got you covered with:

Top Speed Golf’s Complete Game-Improvement System

Today I’m extending you a special invitation to this exclusive VIP community.You’ll join over 100,000 other golfers as serious as you are about playing the best golf of their lives without wasting countless hours practicing.I’ll go into more detail in a bit, but here’s a brief glance at everything you get:

The Top Speed Golf System 5-Part Video Course

The heart and soul of my instruction, this series covers what I call the 5 REAL fundamentals of the golf swing – the ones all of the greatest players have in common.

The Top Speed Golf System is the centerpiece of all my instruction. 

After spending several thousand hours poring over film from the greatest golfers of all time, I discovered there are 5 – and only 5 – swing moves they have in common.

These are the 5 REAL Fundamentals of golf. 

And they determine 95% of your results. 

Master these 5 simple fundamentals and you’ll play great golf whether you have a “strong” or “weak” grip – or a “cupped” or “bowed” wrist… or any of a million other small details that aren’t fundamentals.

Focusing on the tiny things that don’t really matter is a recipe for disaster. 

It overcomplicates a simple game and takes FOREVER to see improvement… because you aren’t working on the few things that really produce results.

My Top Speed Golf System will free up your mind by focusing you on the only 5 Real Fundamentals that every single great swing in history has in common.

I’ll show you how all the top pros — from Hogan to Nicklaus to Tiger to Rory and beyond — perform all 5 of the Top Speed Golf System Real Fundamentals… but they do many other things differently from one another.

This is where it all starts, but there’s more.

Plus 5 Additional Game-Changing Courses

  • 20 Minute Distance Fix: No weightlifting or strenuous stretching required. Just massive distance gains through a series of simple lessons and drills.
  • 20 Minute Shallowing Fix: This is a step-by-step video training based entirely on my Shallow-to-Square Sequence. It’s designed to make shallowing the club EASY… FAST… and AUTOMATIC. So you eliminate mishits, including slices… fat shots … or thin shots… and make consistently flush contact. Get ready to transform your consistency and shoot the lowest scores of your life.
  • Top Speed Golf Wedge and Bunker System: Whether you’ve got to get up-and-down from the sand or you’re facing a delicate 50-yard approach, you’ll have all the shots covered when you finish this course.
  • Top Speed Golf Putting System: There are a million little things you could focus on when it comes to putting. In this course, I’ve boiled it down to the only 6 that really matter if you want to be known as “Mr. Clutch” on the greens.
  • The Opening Drive (a.k.a. “The One Week Miracle”): These videos were hand-picked from various courses to create one series that guarantees you BIG, QUICK WINS (like “before-your-next-round” quick!) 

    • That’s just the start of what All Access Membership gives you. There’s also:

    And 10 Additional BONUS Courses

    • Stop Standing Up: Stay down and through your shots instead of “early extending.”
    • Never Slice Again: Eliminate the Dreaded “Banana Ball” Forever.
    • Stop Chunking & Topping: Avoid these embarrassing score killers.
    • Never Hook Again: Conquer golf’s scariest shot.
    • Play Your Best Golf After 50: Discover simple tweaks and actually defeat “father time.”
    • Secret Science to Improve Faster: Unlock 10x faster progress with recent breakthroughs.
    • Chipping Mastery: Get up and down with ease.
    • Golf Fitness with Joe Yoon: Grab a “cold one” and get in golf shape (seriously!).
    • Master the Mental Game: Drop strokes with simple tips from a renowned sports psychologist.
    • Indoor Impact Sequence: Never let weather sideline you again.

    That’s 19 video courses that will improve your overall game by leaps and bounds.

    So that’s it, right?

    No way.

    As an All Access Member, you’ll be able to participate in:

    LIVE Weekday Video Sessions with Top Speed Certified Instructor Quentin Patterson

    Every weekday my right-hand man will answer any questions you’ve got!

    “Q,” as I call him, is my very own personal instructor. And every weekday, he’s standing by for an entire hour to answer YOUR questions (LIVE)!

    “Q” is one of the few people I trust when I’m working on my own swing.That’s why I have all the confidence in the world that he can quickly solve any golf challenge you bring him.“Q” rarely takes on private students anymore, but when he does he charges at least $100 an hour. So each one-hour weekday call is worth $100.Over the course of a year, there are 250 calls. At $100 each, that works out to $25,000 for daily access to one of the brightest minds in golf instruction today.

    “You seem to have a video that always answers my current question. If not, I use the calls with ‘Q’. I have never felt any of my questions have been left unanswered.”

    Jim | All Access Member

    All Access Members also get… 

    Exclusive Invitations to Top Speed Golf Trainings

    Plus…

    “Early Bird” Invites and Big Discounts (sometimes $500 or more) on Live Events Like the 2-Day Distance Clinic

    OK, gotta catch my breath after going through all that.As promised, I’ll have more details on these benefits momentarily.But since we set the massive goal of helping 20,000 players (like you) add 20 yards of distance, here’s what I’ve decided to do… 

    Here’s Your Chance to Enjoy 120 Days of All Access for Less than Some Guys Spend on Lunch at the Turn…

    There is no long-term commitment. You have 120 days to put All Access to the test. 

    If for any reason you’re not thrilled with the improvement in your golf game…

    Then I insist you contact us for a complete no-questions-asked refund of every penny invested in your game today – all $49. 

    You won’t be able to come back later and take advantage of your extra free month of membership. You’ll pay $49 for the quarter. 

    That’s still amazing value, but why pay more when you don’t have to? 

    With my MONEY BACK GUARANTEE you have nothing to lose.

    If you’re interested but still aren’t completely sure, maybe you’d like to see how other golfers have fared using our programs.  

    The outstanding results our All Access Members report speak for themselves.

    Add 40+ Yards to Your Tee Shots & Shave 5+ Strokes Off Your Scores…

    In 6 weeks or less, All Access Members report lowering their scores by 1.8 shots. And that’s just the average. Nearly 25% shaved 5 or more strokes off their scores.Even better, 6,147 All Access Members added more than 20 yards to their tee shots!2,071 of those members reported 40+ yards of added distance! Don’t be surprised if just a few weeks from now you suddenly become the Big Hitter in your group!But don’t just take my word for it…

    Kevin Cameron

    “I look forward to taking these gains, which could literally be up to 50 yards…out to the course.”

    Peter Voss. – Gilroy, CA

    “I gained 19mph in one week…played Saturday and my drives were all finding the fairway…everyone in my group was amazed”

    Mike M. – Florida

    “I’m hitting all my clubs longer and straighter. Plus my handicap has improved by 4 strokes”

    Still with me?

    Let’s take a more detailed tour of your All Access benefits…

    INSTANT ACCESS TO THE COMPLETE LIBRARY OF 19 TOP SPEED GOLF PROGRAMS COVERING EVERY ASPECT OF YOUR GAME ($3,800 VALUE)

    Included In All Access MembershipIncluded In All Access MembershipIncluded In All Access Membership

    20 Minute Distance Fix

    Value: $200

    Video Course

    I taught a group of 81 golfers a series of drills based on a scientific discovery called Neural Adaptation Technique.And without any strength training or stretching… these golfers added an average of 34.5 yards to their best drives… with 86% of those who completed the program reporting equal or greater accuracy than before!Even more amazing was that those players over 50 years of age actually improved slightly more than the younger fellas.These 81 players paid $497 each for this groundbreaking information. To date, we have a Distance Leaderboard confirming that 1,871 of my students have picked up 40 yards or more!Here’s some of what you’ll learn:

    • A drill used on the PGA Tour called the “Grip Ripper.” I guarantee you haven’t seen this anywhere but it provides big results.
    • The distance delusion that has spread like a virus, scaring players into swinging like the wimpy kid on a playground. (This one personally robbed me of 20-25 yards thwarting my efforts to make the Tour.)
    • The easiest way to unlock “cheats” if you’re not as flexible or as athletic as you once were. (Be prepared to regain that lost power in a hurry!)

    Included In All Access MembershipIncluded In All Access MembershipIncluded In All Access Membership

    20 Minute Shallowing Fix

    Value: $200

    Video Course

    This is a step-by-step video training based entirely on my Shallow-to-Square Sequence. It’s designed to make shallowing the club EASY… FAST… and AUTOMATIC. So you eliminate mishits, including slices… fat shots … or thin shots… and make consistently flush contact. Get ready to transform your consistency and shoot the lowest scores of your life.

    Included In All Access MembershipIncluded In All Access MembershipIncluded In All Access Membership

    The Top Speed Golf System

    Value: $1000

    5 Courses Inside

    Now we come to the heart and soul of my instruction. I spent several thousand hours poring over film from the greatest golfers of all time and discovered there are five – and only five – swing moves all these players have in common.These are the 5 REAL Fundamentals of the golf swing, and you’ll get access to a course for each:

    Stable & Fluid Spine

    • The #1 key to consistent contact in your golf swing (this fixes reverse pivots, swaying, and more).

    Power Turn

    • How to make simple tweaks to your swing to add or regain rotation required for a modern, powerful swing (works wonders for golfers of all ages, especially those who are stiff-as-a-board).

    Top Speed Lag

    • How something called the “stretch shortening cycle” adds tremendous lag (boosting not only distance but also consistency).

    Compression Line

    • The hidden angle at impact that fixes sliding and swinging over the top… while unleashing the power of the legs (so you can whip the club like a clothes hanger)!

    Straight-Line Release

    • How to sync up your entire swing (fixes casting/scooping/flipping by FORCING your hands ahead of the ball at impact).

    Included In All Access Membership

    Top Speed Golf Wedge and Bunker System

    Value: $200

    Full Wedge System

    Whether you’ve got to get up-and-down to save par from the bunker, your wedge shot needs to spin like crazy to check up in “gimmie” range, or you’re facing a 50-yard approach on an easy par 5… you’ll have all the shots covered when you’re finished with this course.

    • The little-known link between jaw dropping drives… and bunker play. (This ONE THING determines if your technique’s good enough to ever play well from the sand.)
    • How to pair a piece of tape with a cheap wrist watch to dial in your wedges (hint: the watch is NOT for timing and rhythm… though, you’ll get a simple verbal cue for that, too).
    • How to hit the magical 40-degree “ultimate grab” angle with a simple right palm hack.

    Included In All Access Membership

    Top Speed Golf Putting System

    Value: $200

    Full Putting System

    There are a million little things you could focus on when it comes to putting. In this course, I’ve boiled it down to the only 6 that really matter if you want to be known as “Mr. Clutch” on the greens.

    • The surprising way concrete mixes with your feet, knees, and belt buckle for more 1-putt greens (and no, you don’t need to buy any Quikrete).
    • What you’re way too focused on when putting (and how that’s costing you easy strokes).
    • Whether your choice of putting stroke – straight back and straight through, slightly arcing, or inside-out – has destined you to failure.

    Included In All Access Membership

    The Opening Drive (a.k.a. “The One Week Miracle”)

    Value: $200

    4 Quick Wins Inside

    There are only a handful of places where recreational golfers lose LOTS of strokes that can also be fixed lightning fast. That’s what you’ll find here in your first All Access Membership course.I hand selected these videos from various courses and created one series that guarantees you BIG, QUICK WINS fast (like “before-your-next-round fast”)! It’s as simple as this:

    • Add 15.6 Yards in Only 20 Minutes!
    • Shallow the Club & Hit the Most Solid Shots of Your Life in a Single Practice Session!
    • Eliminate Chunked & Thinned Chips and Pitches
    • Drop up to 5 Strokes (Without Even One Second of Practice)

    Included In All Access Membership

    9 Additional BONUS Courses

    Value: $1800

    9 Courses Inside

    • Stop Standing Up: Stay down and through your shots instead of “early extending.”
    • Never Slice Again: Eliminate the Dreaded “Banana Ball” Forever.
    • Stop Chunking & Topping: Avoid these embarrassing score killers.
    • Never Hook Again: Conquer golf’s scariest shot.
    • Play Your Best Golf After 50: Discover simple tweaks and actually defeat “father time.”
    • Secret Science to Improve Faster: Unlock 10x faster progress with recent breakthroughs.
    • Chipping Mastery: Get up and down with ease.
    • Golf Fitness with Joe Yoon: Grab a “cold one” and get in golf shape (seriously!).
    • Master the Mental Game: Drop strokes with simple tips from a renowned sports psychologist.
    • Indoor Impact Sequence: Never let weather sideline you again.

    Included In All Access Membership

    LIVE video calls with my right-hand man

    Value: $4000+

    1 Hour Each Week Day

    No All Access Member golfs alone… including me!I go to Top Speed Golf Certified Instructor, Quentin “Q” Patterson, with any questions or concerns I have about my swing and my game… and now, every weekday, Q’s standing by for an entire hour to answer YOUR questions (LIVE)!Over a year’s time, that’s more than $25,000 worth of help available to you! Heck, when you ask Q just one question per month… you’ll easily pay for your entire All Access Membership with this service alone!

    Hidden Benefits Of All Access Membership

    (regular Members often don’t even see these opportunities)

    • All Access Members get exclusive invitations to Top Speed Golf trainings and events. Because of the high-level of access to Top Speed Golf certified instructors, class size is limited. These classes are highly anticipated, and Regular Members are rarely invited to enroll because the classes sell out so quickly to VIP All Access Members.
    • “Early bird” invitations and big discounts (as much as $500 or more) on live training events like the 2-Day Distance Clinic.

    Total Value : $28,800

    Start your 2024 Quarterly membership today and get the rest of 2023 for free!

    Just $49 USD to pre-enroll today, and you won’t be billed again until April 1, 2024 when your membership renews for the second quarter. Cancel easily any time.

    Backed By Our 100% Money-Back Guarantee And Our Unconditional Refund Policy

    And there’s even more. Too much to cover in this short message. Like “The Vault.” 

    “The Vault”

    Every week I’m adding additional video content where we dive deeper into important topics like these…

    Regardless of your personal situation, I absolutely believe I can help you improve your golf game and shoot the lowest scores of your life…

    But only if you have access to all the valuable resources available to All Access Members.

    That’s why it’s so easy for me to make this offer. I’m so confident in the quality of the instruction I provide that I’m going out of my way to get you to try it out. I can help more golfers like you reach their full potential. And you can play the best golf of your life. Everybody wins. It’s as simple as that.

    Here’s another reason you should seriously consider this special invitation.

    The “Hidden” Benefits of All Access Membership…

    As an All Access Member, you’re a VIP in the Top Speed Golf community. 

    That means you get exclusive access to certain programs I don’t make available to everyone else who is not as committed to improving their games as you are…

    The Ball Striking Masterclass is a great example. 

    If you struggle with making consistently solid contact. Or if you already make consistent contact and you’re serious about becoming a great ball striker…

    The Ball Striking Masterclass is exactly what you’ve been searching for…

    Yet if you’re not a VIP All Access Member, you probably didn’t even know about it. 

    While I do my best to help everyone, I believe VIP Members deserve more. 

    In addition, whenever there are live instruction events at my home course near Orlando, Florida, All Access Members are invited first. Like our 2-Day Distance Clinics.

    Not only do VIP Members get early invitations, they’re also offered significant discounts – as much as a $390 savings (a 10X return on your tiny investment today).

    These events often sell out to All Access Members like you. So regular Top Speed Golf Members never even hear about these special opportunities.

    Since you’ve already shown me you’re serious about improving your golf game, I don’t want you to miss out on these special “VIP” opportunities.

    That’s why I’m bending over backwards to convince you to just “dip your toes in the water” today and give All Access a try.

    Why waste hours endlessly searching for YouTube videos that only confuse you when everything you need is included with All Access?

    Membership opens a treasure chest full of valuable golf instruction at such an unbelievable discount that I’m practically giving it away.

    This is a golden opportunity to finally put an end to your confusion, frustration, and overwhelm once and for all…

    And at just $49, your investment for the entire year is less than you’ll probably pay for your next dozen golf balls.

    Remember, there’s no long-term commitment. You have a full year – 365 days – to put All Access to the test.

    Now that you understand the benefits waiting for you as an All Access Member, it’s decision time…

    Will you give All Access a try? Or will you continue your struggle to figure everything out for yourself? 

    It seems like a simple choice. More than 100,000 All Access Members agree.

    $28,600 Worth of Game-Changing Gold for Just 40 Cents Per Day…

    $49 is less than some people spend on lunch and drinks at the turn… 

    And unlike lunch, your access to this treasure trove of golf instruction won’t end when you take your last bite… 

    $49 with the rest of 2023 for free works out to roughly 40 cents per day…

    Even at that ridiculously low investment, there is absolutely NO RISK whatsoever.

    You’ve got a full quarter to “kick the tires” and decide whether or not you like it.

    I’m confident you’ll love it. Otherwise I’d never extend such a generous offer.

    Honestly, if 40 cents per day is too much for everything I’m offering you today, then this is NOT for you.

    Especially considering with my UNCONDITIONAL MONEY BACK GUARANTEE you have everything to gain and nothing to lose.

    Go ahead and accept this special invitation. You must ACT NOW because this golden opportunity vanishes the second you leave this page.

    As soon as you do you’ll be redirected to a secure acceptance form where you can enter your personal information and payment details.Then check your email inbox for instructions on how to enter the All Access portal.I look forward to welcoming you as a valued new All Access Member and a part of the growing group of VIPs in the Top Speed Golf community.Sincerely,

    Co-Founder & Master InstructorTop Speed Golf

    P.S. This is the best offer at the lowest price and the biggest savings you can ever expect to see to enjoy all the benefits of All Access Membership (see benefits listed above).There’s no long-term commitment. You have a full year to put All Access to the test.There’s no risk with my UNCONDITIONAL MONEY BACK GUARANTEE.If you’re not thrilled with the improvement in your golf game and if you’re not shooting your lowest scores ever, I insist you contact me for a full refund of every penny of your $49 investment.You must ACT QUICKLY. This offer expires as soon as you leave this page. You won’t be able to come back later if you change your mind. It’s now or never.I’m confident this is the best investment you can make in improving your golf game. And I’m not alone. All Access Member Paul B agrees. He says…

    “Never had golf instruction that was so clear… Never bought anything in my life with more value.”

    Paul B. | All Access Member

    Go ahead and click on the button below to discover for yourself why my All Access Members love all the benefits.

    Frequently Asked Questions

    Click on a question to see the answer…

    How hard is it to cancel?

    It’s super simple! Cancel anytime at all right from your account page.While I’ll hate to see you leave, the last thing I want to do is keep you here if you don’t want to be. You deserve better than that.Also, I personally hate it when membership sites I use make it hard to cancel, so I made sure there’s a simple process.

    Are your System videos on YouTube?

    You’ve gotten a TON of free instruction from us on YouTube (and will continue to get more). That’s our gift to you.But every video inside the Top Speed Golf System courses are 100% exclusive to this website. We won’t release these anywhere else.That’s partly because they take you step-by-step through the training, building on one another. It’s simply impossible to do a proper course-based system like this on YouTube.And of course, it’s also because paying members deserve to get stuff no one else does.So, with your All Access Membership, you’re going to get videos you’ve never seen before (and will never see anywhere else), as well as a true, structured, systematic learning program to maximize your playing ability.YouTube’s great — but you need more than it can offer. The All Access Membership is where you’ll get it!

    Do you provide video reviews for members?

    We do have a Swing Reviews program for an incredibly reasonable price, which you can sign up for after becoming an All Access Member (if there are spots available).However, there are no free reviews included with the membership.I would love provide this, but currently I can’t offer analysis with the membership.

    How long will this super-low pricing last?

    Perhaps not much longer!We’ve already had to raise prices once to support our growth.I’ve been able to add content to the site faster than expected. So, the value has grown tremendously from when we first launched.And there’s more coming!To continue providing what you want and need, we do expect to charge more before long.But think of how smart you’ll feel when you’re paying way less than everyone who misses out on this offer :-)I recommend you lock in your rate today because you’ll be protected from any future price increases.

    Is your checkout process secure?

    I take site security very seriously.You can see we have enacted full site SSL (the green lock in the address bar), which is rare outside the banking industry.In fact, I had more than one person tell me that we were overdoing it for a site like ours. But the last thing I want is any security issues or our members feeling uneasy about our trustworthiness.In addition, we do not collect or store any of your credit card data on our site/server. We simply securely transmit it to our fully PCI-compliant payment processor, Stripe.You can find out all about their security safeguards here: https://stripe.com/help/security

    Are there limits on video viewing?

    Absolutely not!While you are an All Access Member, you can watch any video, at any time, as often as you like.Of course, if you cancel your membership, you’ll no longer have access to the videos.

    Do your members really improve with the Top Speed Golf System?

    Great question! In fact, I had the exact same question.

    So, I asked how members were doing in their first six weeks.

    I was truly humbled by the success the amazing success they were enjoying. These were the AVERAGES…

    • Picked up 11.2 yards off the tee
    • Dropped their scores 1.8 strokes per round
    • Added 3.5 mph to their driver swing speed
